scripts.version: cross-var node scripts/bump-plugin-version.js $npm_package_version && git add src PTT-Plugin PTT-Packets configs docs
scripts.dev:install: npm run build && npm run build:client && npm run install:files
scripts.zip:files: cd dist && bestzip ../mod.zip user BepInEx && cd .. && node scripts/rename-zip.js
scripts.clean: rimraf -g dist tmp src/**/*.js src/**/*.js.map Trap-PathToTarkov*
scripts.clean:client: dotnet clean && rimraf PTT-Plugin/bin PTT-Plugin/obj PTT-Packets/bin PTT-Packets/obj
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:client && npm run clean
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:all: npm run clean:all && npm run build:all
scripts.build:exfils: node scripts/generate-all-exfils --javascript > src/_generated/all-vanilla-exfils.ts && npm run prettier
scripts.build:all: npm run build:exfils && npm run build:docs && npm run build && npm run build:client
scripts.build:release: npm run rebuild:all && npm run prepare:files && npm run zip:files && npm run git:check:status
scripts.lint:all: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run lint:all && npm run test && npm run build:release
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npm run test && npm run lint:all && npm run build:exfils && npm run build:docs && npm run git:check:status
